entry.title: VANGELO Men Slip Resistant Clog RITZ Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANGELO PROFESSIONAL FOOTWEAR
Type: Men Slip Resistant Clog
Price: 35.00

  • Professional Made Slip Resistant Clog Keeps You Safe and Confident at Dangerous, Slippery Floor Surfaces
  • EVA Foam Body Brings Ultra Light Weight
  • Complete Protection from Dropped Hot Water and Oil
  • US Patent Pending Special Designed Shape and Pattern to enable Units to Channel Fluids and Penetrate Hard Slick Surfaces to Increase Ability to Resist Slipping
  • Easy to Clean and Sanitize, and All Washable Inside and Outside
  • Supportive and Comfortable with Ortholite Removable Insole
  • Suitable for Chefs, Nurses, Gardeners and any other industry workers needing slip resistant footwear.
  • Full Size Range from 4 to 16 US Men Size, and 6 to 18 US Women Size

entry.title: VANGELO Boy VALLO-4KID Dress Shoe Formal Tuxedo for Prom & Wedding Brown Matte - Size from Toddler to Big Kid - Ortholite Insole
entry.s:type: VANGELO Boy Dress Shoe Formal Tuxedo for Prom & Wedding
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANGELO
Type: VANGELO Boy Dress Shoe Formal Tuxedo for Prom & Wedding
Price: 45.00

  • Enjoy Relaxed Sophistication with these VANGELO Boy Dress Shoes, a True Combination of Timeless Style, Fashion and Classic.
  • These Cap Toe Lace Up Oxford Dress Shoes are the Shoes Designed to Suit Up Every Boy and Youth.
  • Vallo Fiber Breathable Vegan Leather Upper Oxford Featuring Stitched Cap Toe and Blind Eyelet Lacing. Breathable Linings, Light Weight EVA sole with Extended Durability.
  • Fully Cushioned Professional Inbuilt Ortholite Insole for Wicking Away Moisture, Odour and Fungus, and Superior Padded Cushy Comfort and Shock Absorption.
  • Heel Measures Approximately 1". Full Size Range from Toddler Size 8 to Big Kid Size 6. Perfectly for Prom, Wedding, Formal, School Uniform or any Formal Occasions. Essential for Elevating the Entire Outfit.
